content: Add authentication system with single shared credential
Create Express.js backend API to replace frontend-only architecture
Implement semantic matching using OpenAI embeddings and cosine similarity
Add project metadata forms for client name, project type, wave number
Implement backend project storage with filesystem structure
Add codeframe persistence and tracking study codeframe reuse
Enhance question grouping UI to support 3 specific question types
Create Excel export with 2-sheet format (Coded_Responses and Codeframe)
Add 30% sampling workflow for initial codeframe generation
Redesign UX/UI to be cleaner and more intuitive
Test and deploy the enhanced application
